glsa.title: nbSMTP: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: nbSMTP is vulnerable to a format string vulnerability which may result in remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: nbSMTP is an SMTP client suitable to run in chroot jails, in embedded systems, laptops and workstations.

description.p: Niels Heinen discovered a format string vulnerability.

impact.p: An attacker can setup a malicious SMTP server and exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running nbSMTP.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All nbSMTP users should upgrade to the latest version:
